mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_users(username, password, salt, locked) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{salt}, #{locked});

delete.foreach: DELETE FROM sys_users_roles WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND role_id = #{roleId};

mapper.select: SELECT r.role FROM sys_roles r JOIN sys_users_roles ur ON r.id = ur.role_id JOIN sys_users u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE u.username = #{username}

SELECT p.permission FROM sys_permissions p JOIN sys_roles_permissions rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id JOIN sys_roles r ON rp.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_users_roles ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_users u ON ur.user_id = u.id WHERE u.username = #{username}
